agents.network_manager.HotspotManager¶

class agents.network_manager.HotspotManager(agent, time_before_resolution=120.0, solver='udpp_merge', archetype_cost_function=None)¶

Bases: Role

HM

Used instead of the flight swap processor to solve a hotspot in a single shot.

By default uses the Hotspot library, in which the default resolution algorithm is UDPP.

__init__(agent, time_before_resolution=120.0, solver='udpp_merge', archetype_cost_function=None)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.
